title: The Effect of Skin Tone Inclusive Dermatology Training on Diagnostic Accuracy and Self-Confidence in Graduate Nursing Students
details: KD Bourne, LE Gray - Journal of the Dermatology Nurses' Association, 2025
abstract: Graduate nursing programs lack skin tone inclusive dermatology curricula, contributing to significant racial and ethnic health disparities in skin of color. This quality improvement project aimed to determine if skin tone inclusive online …
